transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Sir Namaste sir. 
Customer: Haan ji Namaste.
Executive: Sir Akash Pandey baat kar raha hu India Mart se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan haan sir service humne live kar diya hai aapka.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan haan aap service thoda use kariye sir isko thoda sa ki visibility hum aapko 10-10 jagah pe dikha sake.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan isko sir wahi bite sir aur jis place ka humne baat kiya tha na wahi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan wahi ki aur sari inquiry pe reply kariyega.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Aur ek bar properly aap ek bar mere se connect kar lo aap video meet ke liye dobara se ki main aapko samjha saku kaise kaise kam karna hai usse.
Customer: Main jab
Executive: Maine Sharukh bhai ko samjha diya hai waise samjha diya unko unko to samjha diya hai us din pehle video meet connect kiya tha.
Customer: Achha achha theek hai to fir unko samjha sakte hain.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mere ko Sunday ko mere ko Sunday ko samjhana aap Sunday ko mere se jo bhi baat karni hai Sunday ko aate hain aap.
Executive: Sir Sunday ko aate to nahi hai. 
Customer: Call kar lena. Saturday ko Saturday ko free nahi rehte?
Executive: Haan Saturday ko kar lena.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai. Aap isse kam kariye koi bhi problem aa rahi hai to mere ko aap bataiyega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai okay sir Namaste sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants executive to explain on Sunday.

Resolution:

- Executive informed service is live.

- Executive asked to connect for video meet.

- Executive suggested using service for visibility.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Saturday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- service, video meet, visibility, inquiry
